Went tonight with my family (wife, me, 5 year old and one year old). I've had the opportunity to travel quite a bit, and this was truly one of the best meals and experiences I've had. The staff spoke little to no English, we spoke little to no Spanish, yet they went out of their way to bridge the communication gap - including engaging local guests to aide the translation. They politely checked in with us regularly to ensure that we were enjoying our food and that our boys were happy. And the food was simply wonderful: the 'small plates' were anything but small and the flavors were fantastic - we had the vegetable compote and grilled beef with pureed potatoes, my son had the meat pizza - and all were exceptional. Could not more highly recommend this place...
